data.title: Patricia Wettig Net Worth 2024: Discover Her Impressive Earnings
data.meta_description: Explore Patricia Wettig net worth 2024, one of the highest-earning TV actresses. Detailed insights by RachelParris. Learn more now!
data.text:
Curious about Patricia Wettig net worth? Dive into the financial journey of one of the highest-earning TV actresses. From her iconic roles to smart real estate moves, Patricia’s wealth story is fascinating. By RachelParris.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NamePatricia Anne WettigPopular NamePatricia WettigGenderFemaleBirth DateDecember 4, 1951Age72 years oldParentsClifford Neal Wettig, Florence WettigSiblingsPam, Phyllis, PeggyBirthplaceCincinnati, OhioNationalityAmericanEthnicityCaucasianEducationTemple University, Smith College, Ohio Wesleyan UniversityMarital StatusMarriedSexual OrientationStraightHusband/SpouseKen OlinChildrenRoxy Olin, Clifford OlinDatingN/ANet Worth$25 millionSource of WealthActing, Playwriting, Real EstateHeight5 ft 4 in

What is the Net Worth Of Patricia Wettig in 2024?

As of 2024, Patricia Wettig’s net worth stands at a solid $25 million. This impressive figure stems from her long and successful career in both acting and playwriting, as well as strategic real estate investments.

In comparison, her peer Helen Slater has a net worth of around $3 million, and Mel Harris comes in at approximately $10 million.

Patricia’s wealth, much higher than many of her contemporaries, highlights the significant impact of her iconic roles and successful ventures beyond the screen.

Patricia Wettig’s Major Roles and Their Impact on Her Net Worth

Patricia’s portrayal of Nancy Krieger Weston in Thirtysomething significantly boosted her net worth. The show’s success brought her widespread recognition and critical acclaim.

Following this, she took on pivotal roles in Prison Break as Vice President Caroline Reynolds and in Brothers & Sisters as Holly Harper. These roles further cemented her status in Hollywood and contributed to her growing wealth.

Awards and Recognitions Contributing to Her Wealth

Her talent has been recognized with several prestigious awards. She has won three Primetime Emmy Awards and a Golden Globe.

These accolades not only honor her acting skills but also enhance her marketability and demand in the entertainment industry. Awards play a crucial role in an actor’s career, often leading to higher paychecks and more significant opportunities.

Patricia Wettig’s Real Estate Investments

Beyond acting, Patricia and her husband, Ken Olin, have made savvy real estate investments. In 2013, they sold a home in Santa Monica for just under $7 million. In 2017, they sold a NYC co-op for $2.6 million.

In 2019, they purchased a home in Venice, California, for $4.5 million. These investments have significantly contributed to their net worth, demonstrating their financial acumen.

Financial Synergy with Ken Olin

Patricia Wettig‘s financial journey is closely linked with her husband, Ken Olin. Together, they form a power couple in Hollywood, with a combined net worth of $25 million.

Ken, a successful actor and producer, has worked on shows like Alias, The West Wing, and This is Us.

Their combined net worth benefits from both of their successful careers and shared investments. Together, they have built a solid financial foundation, leveraging their industry knowledge and opportunities.

Diversification of Income Sources

Patricia has not relied solely on acting for her income. She has diversified her sources of wealth by venturing into playwriting. She earned a Master of Fine Arts in playwriting from Smith College and has written several plays.

This diversification has helped her maintain a steady income, even when she’s not in front of the camera. Along with her acting and real estate investments, playwriting has played a significant role in her financial stability.

Social Media Accounts

Twitter: N/A

Facebook: N/A

FAQs about Patricia Wettig

What is Patricia Wettig best known for?

She is best known for her role as Nancy Krieger Weston in the TV series Thirtysomething, for which she won three Primetime Emmy Awards and a Golden Globe Award .

Who is Patricia Wettig married to?

She is married to actor and producer Ken Olin. They have been married since 1982.

How many children does Patricia Wettig have?

She and Ken Olin have two children, Clifford and Roxy .

What other notable TV roles has Patricia played?

Besides Thirtysomething, she is known for her roles in Prison Break as Vice President Caroline Reynolds and Brothers & Sisters as Holly Harper.

Has Patricia appeared in any films?

Yes, she has appeared in several films, including City Slickers, City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly’s Gold, and Guilty by Suspicion .

What awards has Patricia Wettig won?

She has won three Primetime Emmy Awards and one Golden Globe Award for her performance in Thirtysomething .

Is Patricia also a playwright?

Yes, she is a talented playwright in addition to her acting career .

Where did Patricia go to college?

She graduated from Temple University with a Bachelor of Arts degree .

What is Patricia Wettig’s most recent work?

Her most recent notable role was in the Netflix anthology series Heartstrings in 2019.

Conclusion
